results.content_html:
Overall, this is the best course on the subject of MVC framework that I have taken on Udemy – I take quite a number of course on this subject. However, there are a number of difficulties which I experience in the course:

1. It is a little hard to follow your presentation because of the accent, though I understand that English is not the first language for any of us.

2. In terms of the method, it is a difficult for me to follow when the tutor moves back and forth between model, view and control files. It may help if sufficient forewarning was given to the students before moving between working files. Maybe it is easier for others to follow, but not for me.

On the other hand, in terms of the techniques of developing an MVC framework, this course is by far the best I have followed on Udemy.
A number of subjects could have included in the course, such as the following:
- Page setting/layout with image;
- Building the right sidebar;
- Creating dynamic menu;
- Image upload. The image upload was included in the change picture method in the course, but in the inscription or the signup, the picture was actually not included. The picture was initially inserted manually, and then only in the 'change picture' it was included. Do for me, in terms of what I captured from the course, I am still lacking the method on how to include the image upload in the data entry such as signup.
